text: [Music]
my name is siavesh a principal solutions
architect focus on microsoft workloads
on aws
i started myself as a support engineer i
started with just individual customer
cases where i was supporting them and
then i tried to kind of find patterns
trends
what is the common issues that customers
see then i felt like okay i need to have
bigger impact basically
[Music]
i applied for a solutions architect
position internally it's very easy to
find other opportunities within the
company where it gives you another
challenge gives you another motivation
to move your career to the next level
you get to work with different services
and you get to have a bigger impact
because now you're working with multiple
customers and you're building solutions
where multiple customers are using it
compared to one support case where you
were resolving it
